name: Slime Vilage
description: A curious, sticky place filled with bouncing goo and hungry blobs.

monster.name: Glooplet
monster.description: Barely sentient but eager to play (and eat).

equipment.name: Sticky Sword
equipment.description: A crude blade made from sticky sap-covered wood, barely holding its shape. A humble beginning for any adventurer.

equipment.name: Slime Bronze Sword
equipment.description: A sturdy sword gleaming with goo, crafted by novice slime smiths. Its bronze edge reflects the maker's care.

equipment.name: Blight Helm
equipment.description: A helm infused with shadowed energy, radiating an aura of corruption and decay.

equipment.name: Void Helm
equipment.description: A sleek and ethereal helm crafted from voidium, granting enhanced agility and perception.

equipment.name: Blight Plate
equipment.description: A corrupted armor forged from shadowed materials, emanating an aura of decay.

equipment.name: Void Plate
equipment.description: A sleek armor made of voidium, designed for agility and enhanced with ethereal energy.

equipment.name: Sticky Shield
equipment.description: A basic shield of slimewood, perfect for beginners.

equipment.name: Slime Bronze Shield
equipment.description: Reinforced with slime-bronze, offering reliable protection.

equipment.name: Sticky Mantle
equipment.description: A slimy, flexible mantle offering basic protection.

equipment.name: Bronze Warden Cape
equipment.description: Bronze-threaded and durable, guarding its wearer.

item.name: Bronze Ore
item.description: Dull copper-brown chunks with streaks of gold, exuding a faint metallic tang.

item.name: Iron Ore
item.description: Jagged, dark gray rocks with a subtle sheen of silver under the light.

item.name: String
item.description: Plain, twisted Fiber with a coarse, natural texture.

item.name: Wool
item.description: Soft, fluffy bundles in pale cream tones, warm to the touch.

item.name: Wood
item.description: Simple, weathered planks of timber with rough bark edges.

monster.name: Oozeling Wriggler
monster.description: Slips through cracks to surprise its prey.

name: Humanoid Beasts
description: Savage lands stalked by cursed raiders and tribal warlords.

monster.name: Oathbreaker Fenlord
monster.description: Bears the scars of countless battles.

equipment.name: Muck Sword
equipment.description: A mithril blade covered in enchanted muck, glowing faintly under moonlight. A rarity among skilled crafters.

equipment.name: Eldritch Hood
equipment.description: A hood woven with eldritch threads, crackling with chaotic magic for arcane defense and power.

equipment.name: Eldritch Robes
equipment.description: Arcane robes crackling with chaotic magic, favored by spellcasters seeking unbridled power.

equipment.name: Muck Shield
equipment.description: Crafted from resilient muckstone, unusually tough.

equipment.name: Luminous Veil
equipment.description: A glowing cape, guiding its wearer through the darkest paths.

item.name: Eldritch Ore
item.description: Twisted metallic shards radiating an unsettling violet glow.

item.name: Sanctum Ore
item.description: Pure white ore speckled with golden veins, emitting a serene aura.

item.name: Aeris Crystal
item.description: Pale blue-green Crystal with swirling mist locked within.

item.name: Glacia Crystal
item.description: Pristine azure Crystal encased in a thin layer of ice.

name: Ashen Ruins
description: Charred remnants of a lost empire guarded by flame and fury.

monster.name: Charbeast
monster.description: A relic of fire given cruel sentience.

equipment.name: Glow Sword
equipment.description: This radiant blade is forged from adamant and glowing slime, making it both beautiful and powerful.

equipment.name: Zephyr Crown
equipment.description: A light crown blessed by unseen winds, offering unmatched grace and agility to its wearer.

equipment.name: Zephyr Godplate
equipment.description: A light and graceful armor, blessed by unseen winds to grant unparalleled mobility in combat.

equipment.name: Glow Shield
equipment.description: Radiates protective light, instilling courage in its wielder.

equipment.name: Cryo Cloak
equipment.description: A frosted design, resistant to the coldest environments.

item.name: Abyssium Ore
item.description: Dark blue minerals with an inky texture, as if forged in the deep sea.

item.name: Brumite Ore
item.description: Frosted silver-blue stones, cold to the touch with a glacial shimmer.

item.name: Terran Ore
item.description: Brownish-green stones with mossy textures clinging to the surface.

item.description: Golden-red Crystal that emit a faint, crackling energy.
